swp_compiler_ss13.common.parser

Interface SymbolTable


  • public interface SymbolTable
    Proposed interface for symbol table
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    "Frank Zechert", "Danny Maasch"
    See Also:
    Symbol Table Wiki, Symbol Table Issue Tracker

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Liveliness getLivelinessInformation(java.lang.String identifier)
      Get the liveliness information of the identifier.
      SymbolTable getParentSymbolTable()
      Get the symbol table of the previous scope.
      void insert(java.lang.String identifier, Type type)
      Insert the identifier identifier of type type into the symbol table.

    • Method Detail

      • getParentSymbolTable

        SymbolTable getParentSymbolTable()
        Get the symbol table of the previous scope. If there is no previous scope returns null.
        Returns:
        The symbol table of the previous scope or null.

      • isDeclared

        java.lang.Boolean isDeclared(java.lang.String identifier)
        Checks if the given identifier is already declared.
        Parameters:
        identifier - The identifier to check.
        Returns:
        true if the identifier is declared, false otherwise

      • lookupType

        Type lookupType(java.lang.String identifier)
        Returns the Type of the given identifier. If the identifier is not defined returns null.
        Parameters:
        identifier - The identifier to lookup.
        Returns:
        The Type of the identifier.

      • insert

        void insert(java.lang.String identifier,
          Type type)
        Insert the identifier identifier of type type into the symbol table.
        Parameters:
        identifier - The identifier to insert into the symbol table.
        type - The Type of the identifier.

      • remove

        java.lang.Boolean remove(java.lang.String identifier)
        Remove the identifier from the symbol table.
        Parameters:
        identifier - The identifier to remove.
        Returns:
        true if the identifier was removed, false if it was not in the symbol table and therefore not removed.

      • setLivelinessInformation

        void setLivelinessInformation(java.lang.String identifier,
                            Liveliness liveliness)
        Set the liveliness information of the identifier.
        Parameters:
        identifier - The identifier.
        liveliness - New liveliness information.

      • getLivelinessInformation

        Liveliness getLivelinessInformation(java.lang.String identifier)
        Get the liveliness information of the identifier.
        Parameters:
        identifier - The identifier to get the liveliniess informations for.
        Returns:
        The liveliness information or null if none.
